channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole, 3rd March
item.description:
In road opposite alley. Near safety rail.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 347 Innsworth Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip of an inflatable pond / paddle pool, 3rd March
item.description:
The location is on the Cleeve Common Road in the layby / passing place by the entrance to the Sabrina Way Byway on the right hand side going towards the common. In the area is the above item together with other material - cardboard and car parts. Please can they be cleared up as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge dumped in the cloisters, 3rd March
item.description:
Fridge has been dumped in corner of the cloisters
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Cloisters, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least three big potholes in Hearne Road charlton Kings, 3rd March
item.description:
A long time!!! An accident is bound to happen!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Buckles Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary bus stop, 3rd March
item.description:
There is a metal framed temporary bus stop notice outside houses 206-208a Hatherley Road on a narrow pavement. This has never been used as a bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 213 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Potholes in College Baths Road, 2nd March
item.description:
The potholes in College Baths Road have been there since last year & are getting progressively worse. They are particularly dangerous for cyclists who have to ride towards oncoming traffic to avoid them or dismount.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Murvagh Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several deep potholes along this short stretch of road dangerous to cyclists now that schools are returning, 2nd March
item.description:
Perviously reported but still no action
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Hearne Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crater, 2nd March
item.description:
There is a super deep pothole looks like it is down to the base layer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Norwood Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous pothole continuing to grow, 2nd March
item.description:
Previous pothole recently patched. but now getting larger and edge from join to repair has deteriorated further creating large pothole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Caernarvon Road, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 or 5 huge potholes in the road, 2nd March
item.description:
From helens close junction up to the primary school. Loads of huge potholes. Present for at least 3 month
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 The Homestead Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole just outside Revamp, 1st March
item.description:
Large pothole outside Revamp. I did originally report this a year ago! Please can this be sorted before it does damage to someone's tyres - thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Great Norwood Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter again, 1st March
item.description:
Particularly bad here - please could it be cleaned
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Castle Hill Cottage A417, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 1st March
item.description:
The verges either side of this road are covered with litter - it's really horrible. Please can it be cleaned up and signs put out warning of CCTV - at least this might deter some people. thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Brimpsfield
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter, 1st March
item.description:
The A417 verges are covered with litter either side but this area is one of the worst. It is v bad for the environment and looks awful - please can it be cleaned up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of litter dumped, 1st March
item.description:
Large amount of rubbish dumped again - this seems to be a favoured spot for flytippers
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bartlow Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes, 1st March
item.description:
Massive potholes, please fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a large deep pothole that is getting bigger and deeper., 1st March
item.description:
The hole has been here for several months. The hole is in front of No 8, Chelmsford Avenue. When vehicles hit the pothole it sprays large pebbles and debris onto the footpath which is a hazard to pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Chelmsford Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked road drain, 1st March
item.description:
For some reason a road drain has been covered with a patch of tarmac. This causes a large puddle to form covering half the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White Towers Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers and cones, 1st March
item.description:
Barriers and cones left around a pothole are causing traffic to drive onto soft verges. Under the soft verge there is the former tarmac lane surface. The soil could be removed to provide a suitable running surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on crest of slope, 1st March
item.description:
Pothole is causing vehicles to drive off the lane surface
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
